home.name: Tetsuya Maeda
home.title: Full Stack Engineer
home.description: A full stack engineer specializing in designing and developing modern web applications. I focus on creating user-centric products using a tech stack centered around React, Next.js, and Node.js.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Experience and Skills
about.bio: A full stack engineer with over 5 years of web development experience. I have worked on projects of various scales from startups to large enterprises, covering a wide range of technical areas from frontend to backend and infrastructure.
